attributes.title: Idk how to read
attributes.review: Idk how to read so this app was not for me or basically any app for that matter but go trump even tho... i cant read. I hope whqt others say is true lol

attributes.title: no 💜
attributes.review: this app will send a signal to a hacker nearby, who will then come to your house. trust me, it happened to me. the hacker then stabbed me 2020 times while screaming, "TRUMP 2020". ridiculous how unsafe this app is. anyway, stream fancy by twice 😼
I don’t like the home page 0/10. I was expecting something better considering he’s been in a bunker all this time 😡. No creativity!!!
Right when I downloaded the app it was all raist talking about color this app is so bad it needs to get banned it dose not matter about your skin we are all the same

attributes.title: Ummmm ? Excuse me ?
attributes.review: I wasn’t aware that my phone would glitch if I downloaded this app. Be cautious everyone, I am deleting it immediately and you should do the same .

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I was so excited to download our totally not racist, sexist, misogynistic, ableist, islamaphobic, transphobic, homophobic presidents app. It turns out it’s run by the chinese and they’re stealing our data to run climate change

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!
attributes.review: Terrible app, so hard to work with. The way that it’s set up does not allow for easy access of information. Worst app I’ve ever downloaded!!! 👎😾

attributes.title: canada here i come
attributes.review: i supported my wonderful amazing president such a strong man, so so smart. genius. i got this app fully to support him but then my cousin interrupted me to make out and by the time i went back on my phone, the app had completely destroyed my phone. i’m talking big steaming nasty hole in the middle of my phone. disgusted and ashamed of what we have created in the studio today.

attributes.title: Sad
attributes.review: Took forever to download, no accurate information and hard to use

attributes.title: He’s terrible
attributes.review: After downloading the app and trying to delete it, because I realized how terrible Donald Trump is, it wouldn’t delete! It also started sending me threats via email!! THIS IS A TERRIBLE APP!!!
